name: BasketballLingofromSportsLingocom
0:
”Alexa, launch basketball lingo.”
”Alexa ask basketball lingo to tell me a random term.”
”Alexa ask basketball lingo for a new definition.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: basketball lingo
des: Basketball Lingo by SportsLingo.com allows you learn and explore basketball terminology in a revolutionary new way! Simply ask Basketball Lingo for a random basketball term and you will be greeted back with a random word to learn. Perfect for learning one or more words, each day! With a database of hundreds of basketball terms, you'll be talking like the pros in no-time.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
